PSCT.Base: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated: Send 1 face-up Monster Card from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only activate 1 "Centur-Ion True Awakening" per turn.
